# Pull Request Template

## Description

Please include a summary of the changes and related context.

## Related Issues

Closes #(issue number)

## Testing

Please describe the tests you ran and how to reproduce them:

- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] No new warnings generated

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have tested locally to ensure functionality works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests passed with my changes

Add screenshots for UI changes.

Any additional information that reviewers should know.
